hero.title: {name}
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer at TikTok
hero.description: Passionate about building scalable systems and optimizing infrastructure. Currently working on TikTok's video delivery and storage optimization systems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in distributed systems and infrastructure optimization. With a background from Nanyang Technological University, I've worked across finance (Goldman Sachs), AI (SenseTime), and currently at TikTok, where I focus on video infrastructure and edge computing solutions.

tiktok.title: Software Engineer at TikTok
tiktok.description: Leading infrastructure optimization projects in video delivery, edge computing, and storage systems.

senseTime.title: AI Product Engineer at SenseTime
senseTime.description: Developed and delivered AI solutions for enterprise clients.

goldman.title: Engineering Intern at Goldman Sachs
goldman.description: Contributed to financial technology solutions and engineering systems.

traits.title: Engineering Approach
traits.innovative: System Optimization - Finding efficient solutions to complex infrastructure challenges
traits.communicative: Technical Leadership - Driving projects from concept to production
traits.analytical: Data-Driven - Making decisions based on metrics and performance analysis
traits.thoughtful: Architecture Design - Building scalable and maintainable systems

vod.title: Omnierse Cloud-Edge System
vod.description: Developed a system facilitating cloud-edge collaboration with reusable tools for strategy optimization. Improved resource utilization and system performance through intelligent workload distribution.

p2p.title: P2P Video Distribution MVP
p2p.description: Led the MVP phase of TikTok's P2P content delivery network. Successfully implemented a peer-to-peer system that significantly reduced server costs while maintaining streaming quality.

storage.title: Storage Optimization Engine
storage.description: Built a data analysis system for storage optimization, processing large volumes of offline data to identify and remove unpopular content, resulting in significant storage cost savings.

upload.title: TikTok Media Upload Framework
upload.description: Enhanced TikTok's media upload infrastructure through edge upload system development, upload scheduling optimization, and system refactoring, improving upload success rates and performance.
